name: SCHNEIDER NATIONAL CARRIERS, Petitioner, v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (Beardon), Respondent
name_abbreviation: Schneider National Carriers v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: SCHNEIDER NATIONAL CARRIERS, Petitioner, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (Beardon), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of December, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, is granted. The order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed. See Universal Am-Can, Ltd. v. W.C.A.B. (Minteer), 563 Pa.480, 762 A.2d 328 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
786 A.2d 203
SCHNEIDER NATIONAL CARRIERS, Petitioner, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (Beardon), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 20, 2001.
